resources.string: 1.Paris was founded about 1825, was incorporated in 1853, and was re-incorporated in 1873. 2.The first printed edition appeared in London in 1553. 3.There is a public park, besides bowling-greens and cricket and football fields. 4.Through the whole of this tract the letters are used which are common to Persian, Arabic and Turkish, written from right to left. 5.His particular research interests were in Artificial Intelligence applied to advanced automation. 6.The car warmed quickly and she fell asleep again. 7.They would have some time to enjoy a late Christmas at home when they returned.
